synopsis.text: He ir to the legendary Naruto Uzumaki, the 7th Hokage, Boruto Uzumaki possesses an insatiable energy and a knack for mischief. As the Chunin exams approach, a bitter disagreement with his father ignites a burning ambition within Boruto to outshine him with his own unique abilities. To achieve this, he seeks the mentorship of Sasuke Uchiha, Naruto's lifelong rival and friend. However, the path to surpassing his father is not as straightforward as Boruto initially thought. As a new generation of shinobi prepares to face unforeseen enemies and restore peace to Konoha, Boruto discovers the true essence of being a ninja and the challenges his father once endured. In this thrilling adventure, Naruto and his allies must unite to safeguard their village from a looming threat, while Boruto learns valuable lessons about family, teamwork, and the importance of forging his own path.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
